data.description:
## Problem
Sub-agents report success but file changes don't persist to the main agent's filesystem.

## Evidence from 2025-12-22 session (QkbsL)
1. Implementation agent reported adding JUSTIFIES/PART_OF to EdgeType enum
2. Agent showed verification output proving changes worked
3. But `git status` showed no changes to the file
4. Main agent had to manually apply the same changes

## Investigation Tasks
1. Understand how Task tool spawns sub-agents and their filesystem context
2. Determine if sub-agents share the same filesystem or work in isolation
3. Test with explicit file verification after sub-agent completion
4. Check if there's a flush/sync issue with file writes

## Possible Solutions
- Require sub-agents to commit changes before returning
- Have main agent always verify file state after sub-agent work
- Store diffs in task metadata for recovery
data.title: Investigate sub-agent file persistence issue
